name: Estimated funding and future needs for HIV in low and middle income countries - UNAIDS
title: Estimated funding and future needs for HIV in low and middle income countries - UNAIDS
description: Estimated funding to addressing HIV in low-to-middle income countries by region until the year 2016. Also provided by UNAIDS are estimates of resource requirements from 2018-2030 in low-to-middle income countries to meet fast-track HIV targets by 2030.
